name: Classic Margherita Pizza
instructions: Mix flour and yeast with water
Let dough rise for 1 hour
Roll out dough
Add tomato sauce and cheese
Bake at 450°F for 12-15 minutes
Garnish with fresh basil

name: Chicken Stir Fry
instructions: Cut chicken into strips
Heat oil in wok
Cook chicken until golden
Add vegetables
Add soy sauce and ginger
Serve over rice

name: Vegetable Curry
instructions: Sauté onions and garlic
Add curry powder and ginger
Add vegetables and cook
Pour coconut milk
Simmer for 20 minutes
Serve with rice

name: Caesar Salad
instructions: Wash and chop lettuce
Make dressing with egg, lemon, garlic
Toss lettuce with dressing
Add parmesan and croutons
Serve immediately

name: Spaghetti Carbonara
instructions: Cook spaghetti
Fry bacon until crispy
Mix eggs and parmesan
Combine hot pasta with egg mixture
Add bacon and pepper
Serve immediately

name: Lentil Soup
instructions: Sauté vegetables
Add lentils and broth
Simmer for 30 minutes
Season to taste
Serve hot

name: Beef Tacos
instructions: Brown ground beef
Add taco seasoning
Warm tortillas
Assemble tacos with toppings
Serve with lime

name: Greek Salad
instructions: Chop vegetables
Crumble feta
Mix all ingredients
Dress with olive oil and lemon
Serve chilled

name: Pad Thai
instructions: Soak noodles
Scramble eggs
Cook shrimp
Stir fry noodles with sauce
Add peanuts and sprouts
Serve with lime

name: Mushroom Risotto
instructions: Sauté mushrooms
Toast rice
Add wine
Gradually add broth, stirring
Finish with butter and parmesan
Serve immediately

name: Mushroom Spinach Risotto
instructions: Heat olive oil in a large pan over medium heat and sauté onions and garlic until translucent.
Add the mushrooms and cook until they are soft.
Pour in the rice and stir for 2 minutes to lightly toast it, then deglaze the pan with white wine.
Add the vegetable broth one cup at a time, allowing the liquid to be absorbed before adding more, stirring often.
When the rice is almost cooked, add the spinach and cook until it wilts.
Remove from heat and stir in Parmesan cheese. Season with salt and pepper to taste.
Serve warm.

name: Mushroom Spinach Alfredo Pasta
instructions: Cook pasta according to package instructions.
In a pan, heat olive oil over medium heat and sauté garlic until fragrant. Add mushrooms and cook until they're browned.
Add spinach to the pan and cook until wilted.
Stir in the alfredo sauce and heat through.
Toss the cooked pasta with the sauce and vegetables, and sprinkle with parmesan cheese before serving.

name: Mushroom Spinach Pasta
instructions: Cook pasta according to package instructions.
While pasta cooks, heat olive oil in a pan, add finely chopped garlic and sliced mushrooms, sauté until mushrooms are golden.
Add spinach to the pan, cook until wilted.
Drain pasta and mix with the sautéed vegetables. Season with salt and pepper.
Serve hot, topped with grated Parmesan cheese.

name: Avocado Toast
instructions: Toast the whole grain bread until golden brown.
In a bowl, mash the ripe avocados with lemon juice, salt, and pepper.
Spread the mashed avocado on the toasted bread.
Sprinkle chili flakes on top for added flavor.

name: Avocado Toast
instructions: Toast the whole grain bread slices until golden brown.
In a bowl, mash the avocados and mix in the juice of one lemon, salt, and pepper.
Spread the mashed avocado evenly onto the toasted bread.
Drizzle with olive oil and sprinkle with red pepper flakes before serving.

name: Avocado Toast with Poached Egg
instructions: Toast the slices of whole grain bread until golden brown.
In a bowl, mash the avocados with lemon juice, salt, and pepper.
Spread the mashed avocado evenly on each slice of toasted bread.
Bring a pot of water to a gentle simmer and poach the eggs for about 3-4 minutes.
Remove the poached eggs and place one on each avocado toast.
Sprinkle with red pepper flakes and fresh herbs if desired.

name: Marshmallow Chocolate Fondue
instructions: In a saucepan, combine dark chocolate and heavy cream over low heat, stirring until melted and smooth.
Once the chocolate mixture is ready, pour it into a fondue pot. Skewer marshmallows and fruits on fondue forks and dip into the warm chocolate.

name: Marshmallow Chocolate Crisp Treats
instructions: In a large saucepan, melt butter over low heat.
Add mini marshmallows and stir until completely melted.
Remove from heat and add rice cereal, stirring until well combined.
Spread the mixture into a greased 9x13 inch pan and press down firmly.
Melt chocolate chips in a microwave or double boiler and pour over the top of the treats.
Allow to cool before cutting into squares.

name: Marshmallow Chocolate Fondue
instructions: In a saucepan, combine chocolate chips and heavy cream over low heat, stirring until melted and smooth.
Once melted, remove from heat and stir in marshmallows until well coated. Serve with strawberries and banana slices for dipping.

name: Watermelon and Dragon Fruit Salad
instructions: Cube the watermelon and dragon fruit into bite-sized pieces.
In a bowl, combine the watermelon, dragon fruit, lime juice, and honey. Toss gently.
Chill the salad in the refrigerator for 15 minutes.
Garnish with fresh mint leaves before serving.

name: Avocado Salad
instructions: Cut the avocados in half, remove the pit, and scoop the flesh into a bowl.
Dice the cherry tomatoes and red onion, and add them to the bowl.
Chop the cilantro and add it to the mixture.
Squeeze the lime juice over the salad, and season with salt and pepper to taste.
Gently toss everything together and serve.

name: S'mores Dip
instructions: Preheat the oven to 350°F (175°C).
In an oven-safe dish, layer chocolate chips evenly at the bottom, then top with marshmallows.
Bake in the oven for 10-12 minutes until the marshmallows are golden brown.
Serve warm with graham crackers for dipping.

name: Avocado Toast with Poached Eggs
instructions: Toast the slices of whole grain bread until golden brown.
In a bowl, mash the avocados with lemon juice, salt, and pepper.
Spread the mashed avocado evenly on the toasted bread.
In a pot, bring water to a gentle simmer and poach the eggs for about 3-4 minutes.
Place a poached egg on each avocado toast.
Sprinkle with red pepper flakes and fresh herbs for garnish.

name: Blueberry Muffins
instructions: Preheat the oven to 375°F (190°C).
In a mixing bowl, cream the butter and sugar together.
Add the eggs and vanilla extract, mixing well.
In another bowl, combine the flour, baking powder, and salt.
Gradually add the dry ingredients to the wet mixture, alternating with milk.
Gently fold in the blueberries.
Spoon the batter into a greased muffin tin.
Bake for 20-25 minutes or until a toothpick comes out clean.
